title: How can database technologies help a company? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nowadays young people seem to ignore the fact that the reason why computers were created in the first place was to manage great quantities of information. Database are used to solve questions, those questions are about information you need every day and you can do things better if you have the answer to these questions. For example: How much money do we have?How much do we owe? To what institutions?How much do other people owe us? Are people paying on time, or are they withholding payments? How much time has it passed since those people payed last? Are these people still buying on credit?What products do we have on store? How much on inventory?Has any of our products been stolen? Who is most likely the person who stole those items?What products are selling the most? What products are selling the least? Are there some products that are not selling at all?Do I need to lend money to pay next Payroll? How much? How soon can I anticipate to pay that loan? How much am I going to lose for that operation? Can I do something about it to prevent it from happening again?What are the trends of our customers? What are they buying? Are they buying the same as they did last year? What should I do to promote more selling? Can I take advantage of current trends to maximize my profits? Should I reduce prices to prevent people from going away with the competition?How are people responding to our latest promotions? How much money did we invest? Did we get our money back? Which promotions worked? Which promotions did not?All those questions, and hundreds more need to be answered in order for a company to stay afloat or succeed, and that is at a high level, there are other hundreds of questions that need answer at user level, from a simple thing as a name and current balance of a customer, the current balance and price on inventory products, to the complexities of automated computing calculations of a big complex operation. At the very end, the information of a database technology is invaluable, because the better information you have, the best your operation can perform.
